Package ru.sfu.controller

Class TelevisionController

java.lang.Object
ru.sfu.controller.TelevisionController
@Controller @EnableMethodSecurity @RequestMapping("/tvs") public class TelevisionController extends Object
Controller for Television CRUD operations
Author:
Agapchenko V.V.
